name: Pakible
long_description:
2000+ customers use Pakible including Samsung, Reddit, Soylent, and the Golden State Warriors.

We make it insanely easy to design, price, and manufacture custom product packaging.

Leveraging in house software to automate operations, an incredibly user-friendly customer-facing interface, plus amazing people + vendors. Pakible is an unbeatable experience and price compared to brokers or direct manufacturers.

Packaging is the most slept-on market in the world, a $500B market just domestically representing over 2% of US GDP.

We're a startup of < 10 people. Come build something special with us, and have a huge role in doing so.
